Question: How to get the value of a key in a JSONObject?: I have a JSONObject and I want to get the value of a key.
Please using this api: Iterator.next.
Answer:<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: String result = "";boolean first = true;for(String string : collectionOfStrings) {    if(first) {        result+=string;        first=false;    } else {        result+=","+string;    }}
<<<explanation>>>: You can use JSONObject.get(String key) to get the value of a key.
